reviews.content: It is not recording the actual audio when I am video recording from the camera app. It records when I disable the tweak from iCleaner Pro. Please fix that. Itâ€™s really important.

To make it work 
1- Press to record screen 
2- play anything in YT while recording 
3- Go to music app and play anything 
4- once you are done , go back and cut off the unwanted stuff . 
(Reviewed by @iTollMouS)
